name: Valhalla Knights 3 Gold Edition
description:
Valhalla Knights 3 Gold will offer improved battle speed and operability, story additions, shorter load times, and is described as close to a full remake.

Save data from the original release can be used in Valhalla Knights 3 Gold. And it will also be compatible with PS Vita TV.

New facilities like the Red Light District’s “Erotica Heaven”, new races like the Angel and Demon, and five new jobs, including the Gunner, are being added.

The game will also have ad-hoc and Wi-Fi multiplayer in the form of co-op and competitive battle modes.

Early buyers will receive the limited “Challenge from a Saint” quest, “Dark Lord’s Work Bid” item, and “Want to Undress More! Phantom Limit Girigiri Armor” item.
